project.description: Custom job which can be triggered at any instant of time. It does shallow clone, builds Harvester, installs VECTORCAST in shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/custom

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
cd %WORKSPACE% set path=%path:"=% call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat" set VECTORCAST_DIR=N:\shared\.VCAST_REGRESSION\custom\VCAST_WINDOWS set PYTHONPATH=C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\junit_xml-1.0-py2.7.egg set VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=C:\flexlm\vector-INDIAWINDOWSBUI.lic
xcopy /S /I /E %WIN_GIT_DIR%\tests tests /Q /Y rem xcopy /S /I /E V:\Harvester\tests tests /Q /Y REM call buildWin.bat msvc9 --arch=all REM cd build REM call install.bat REM set _VC_TEST_ENV_=1
cd %WORKSPACE% mkdir tbuild32_msvc10 cd tbuild32_msvc10 cmake ..\tests echo vcQuickParseTest >> vc_test_add_dir echo vcInstTest >> vc_test_add_dir %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython VcRunTests.py --metrics
